attributes.action: Increase the size of new houses and lower density on new developments
attributes.additional_details:
New build houses for average families have for a long time been referred to by the public as 'rabbit hutches'. If this is the common consensus then why does the government never address it? Answer/ Because no MP has to live in them.

This petition is about getting the government to recognise that we are producing ever more inferior housing by the decade and that it must improve.

Many other countries are well ahead of us so we can at least look to them to see "what are they doing that we are not?"
